column4: I am trying to change the boot order in grub.  I currently have Ubuntu 11.10 and win 7 dual booted
can someone point me in the right direction please?
how do I access that escott?
I want to make windows 7 my first boot, currently ubuntu is
ok escott, are you can you help me when I boot into ubuntu in a few minutes?
open a terminal and use grub-set-default.  check the help screen/man page for details.
